name: Nessie (Autoghost)
author: ywkls
info: Creates a 4 x 2 enemy that only can move in water, similar to the Loch Ness Monster.
description: This is designed as a mini-boss for a water dungeon. The foe spews 3 fireballs every 1.5 seconds and submerges to become invulnerable every 3 seconds. Inspired by ideas submitted by GrantGreif. Tiles by Ryan914, Tonberry2K, Kazuu90210 of Spriter's Resource.Update- 9-4-15- Changed fireballs so that they track you and split into four random fires on impact. Changed flags so he won't swim in shallow water.
setup: Create 4 combos in this order. Surfaced, facing left; surfaced, facing right; submerged, facing left; submerged, facing right. The enemy is designed to be 4 x 2.Requires=std.zhstring.zhghost.zh
